Title: Wild Things
Description:
Welcome to the Order of the Cloud Serpent, $r. I can see from the spark in your eye that you wish to join the Order.

Let me get a good look at you.

<Elder Anli gently holds your head and gazes at your face.>

Hmm. I see honesty and earnestness in your heart. You have journeyed far to come here, but I am afraid you must go yet further.

Your path into the Order begins now.

Speak to Instructor Tong at Windward Isle to the northeast to take the first step.
ObjectivesText: Find Instructor Tong at Windward Isle in the Jade Forest.
RewardText:
Thank goodness, they finally sent someone!

Things have gotten out of control!
